events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund because the size didn't fit at all and I want to return it.
The system has identified this case as a refund request related to a product size issue and return inquiry.
Your case has been assigned to one of our customer service representatives who specializes in refund and return processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return the jacket and receive a refund. How can I assist you further today?
Could you please provide your order number and the date of purchase so I can look up the transaction and start processing your refund?
Sure, my order number is 987654321, and I bought it just last week on June 8th. I’d appreciate your help with the refund process.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund upon return. Please use the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly to send the jacket back.
That sounds perfect, thank you! I’m glad the return will be hassle-free and the refund straightforward.
I have sent you the return label and instructions. Once we receive the jacket, we will process your refund immediately.
We are following up to confirm you received the return shipping label and to ask if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Your refund has been processed and the case is now closed. Thank you for your patience and for shopping with us.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey regarding your experience with our return and refund service.
